=`flip`=
{{{
Edge flip(Edge e)
}}}

  ==Keywords==
  flip, delaunay

  ==Authors==
  Kurt Norwood

  ==Introduction==
  The {{{flip}}} function takes a single Edge as a parameter and performs a flip on it. This involves determining the new length of the edge after the flip and changing the topological information in the edge being flipped as well as all its adjacent simplices.
